title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX). The Windows workstations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PCs are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: When a new file is created on Windows, the line delimiters are set to Windows style (CRLF).
EB: Even if the new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix style line delimiters (LF) since the end product is a Unix product.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open Eclipse on a Windows workstation. 
2. Create a new file. 
3. Check the line delimiters used in the new file. 

Expected: The new file should have Unix style line delimiters (LF).
